sent.orig: The auxiliary body projects from the main body and detecting an obstacle around the main body.
sent.trans: 辅助体从主体伸出并检测主体周围的障碍。

sent.orig: An indicator of body density as determined by the relationship of BODY WEIGHT to BODY HEIGHT.
sent.trans: 体重指数表示的是身体密度，由体重除以身高的平方确定。

sent.orig: Siberian ginseng can lessen body's tiredness; build up body's strength, and also energize body's vitality.
sent.trans: 刺五加又称[伯利亚人蔘]可减少疲劳感、强体力、旺盛精神，是工作烦累的您不可不试的优质产品。

sent.orig: The light body is a body and holds larger version the etheric body and all chakras.
sent.trans: 光体是一个持有更大版本之以太体和所有脉轮的翻版体。

sent.orig: The stimulation of carotid body to carotid body is about 7 times of carotid body.
sent.trans: 颈动脉体对呼吸的刺激作用约为主动脉体的7倍。
